[docs]def make_tuple(arg):
    if not isinstance(arg, tuple):
        arg = (arg, )
    return arg


if __name__=="__main__":

    def a():
        return 1

    def b():
        return 1, 2

    print(make_tuple(a()))
    print(make_tuple(b()))
